title: #81: Sam Kinison (Don Barris, Mary Jane, Airy Shiyfer)
itunes:title: Sam Kinison with Don Barris
description: Don Barris invited me over to his studio where I tried and failed to get him to talk about his road rage. Instead we stumbled upon an amazing topic that I'm glad to have explored. Sam Kinison. He wasn't just a comedian. He was a leader. When he had his run of the Comedy Store, he was a force of nature around there.
